faction_status.enemy.con: %s glares at you, ready to attack.
faction_status.hero.con: %s looks at you with stars in their eyes.
faction_status.villain.con: %s stares at you with vileness in their heart.
faction_status.unknown.con: %s doesn't even know who you are.
